Package org.protune.net Description

Package org.protune.net provides a number of classes taking care of the issues related with the communication among nodes of a network. A generic node of a Peer to Peer network is represented by the interface Peer.
This package tries to hide the further complexity requested by the communication among nodes of a network by providing facilities which should let the programmer to focus on the application. The application logic is represented by the (abstract) class Service. Theoretically a programmer should simply incapsulate the logic of her/his application in a subclass of it.
